dataset_summary: 8k cord blood mononuclear cells sequenced by CITEseq, a multimodal addition to the 10x scRNA-seq platform that allows simultaneous measurement of RNA and protein.
5k cells from a time-series of dexamethasone treatment sequenced by sci-CAR, a combinatorial indexing-based co-assay that jointly profiles chromatin accessibility and mRNA.
11k cells from adult mouse kidney sequenced by sci-CAR, a combinatorial indexing-based co-assay that jointly profiles chromatin accessibility and mRNA.
